a.text: High level process of a reversal of mind

g.title: was previously attached?->reverses perception from (bliss/safety) to stress
is more complicated?->reverses perception from (unknown/false) to true
reverses perception from true to false
g.text: reverses perception from true to false

g.title: is more complicated?->reverses perception from true to false
reverses perception from true to false->__e2
